name: Hope - Anchor Bronze Wax Seal Charm
description: Handcrafted from an antique wax seal stamp from England, this wax seal charm features an anchor which symbolizes hope. As the anchor was often a seaman’s last resort in stormy weather, it was frequently connected with hope. The anchor remains firm and steady amidst the stormy waters, symbolizing the stable part of a being, that quality which enables us to keep a clear mind amid the confusion of sensation, emotion and the general “storms” of life. This charm is just over a 1/2” round and hangs on a 17" bronze baby ball chain that closes with a ball chain connector clasp. Other types of chains are sold separately. Handcrafted in my studio just outside of Houston, Texas, each symbolic wax seal item from The Silver Acorn is hand-stamped in reclaimed fine silver or bronze and will be slightly different and uniquely yours. (Click on image to enlarge.)

name: Jewish Tree of Life Wax Seal Stamp
description: Handcrafted from a vintage wax seal stamp, this charm bears the Star of David in the middle of the tree of life which symbolizes protection, long life, connection, strength, eternity and wisdom. The Star of David, a symbol first seen in writing in a 12th century work which has become associated with the Jewish people and their sanctuaries. The Star of David (in Hebrew Magen David- literally ‘shield of David’) poetically refers to God. This six sided figure symbolizes that God rules over the universe and protects us from all six directions: North, South, East, West, Up and Down with the middle of the hexagram providing the spiritual dimension. The tree of life is mentioned in the Book of Genesis and it is distinct from the tree of the knowledge of good and evil; it is associated with immorality or eternity. And the LORD God said, “The man has now become like one of us, knowing good and evil. He must not be allowed to reach out his hand and take also from the tree of life and eat, and live forever.” After Adam and Eve fell from God's favor by eating fruit from the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, they were cast out of the Garden of Eden. Remaining in the garden, however, was the tree of life. To prevent access to this tree in the future, a cherubim and a flaming sword was placed at the garden's entrance. (Genesis 3:22-24) In the Book of Proverbs, the tree of life is associated with wisdom: "[Wisdom] tree of life to those who take hold of her; those who hold her fast will be blessed." (Proverbs 3:13-18). The tree of life is symbolic of long life, connection, strength, eternity and wisdom. The charm is approximately 1” round and hangs on a 17" bronze baby ball chain that closes with a ball chain connector clasp. Other types of chains are sold separately. Handcrafted in my studio just outside of Houston, Texas, each symbolic wax seal item from The Silver Acorn is hand-stamped in reclaimed fine silver or bronze and will be slightly different and uniquely yours. When Cupid saw how beautiful Psyche was, he dropped the arrow meant for her and pricked himself and fell in love with her. Cupid visited her every night to sleep with her, but demanded that she never cast her eyes upon him. Curious, Psyche held a lamp over Cupid as he slept, but a drop of oil fell from her lamp onto Cupid's shoulder and woke him. She watched him fly away, and she was heartbroken. After passing various tasks given to her by Venus, Cupid and Psyche were reunited. Jupiter made Psyche a goddess allowing Cupid and Psyche to get married and they lived happily ever after. name: Wax Seal Leather Cuff
description: Customize your cuff by choosing your favorite charm and I’ll attach it to the leather cuff. Only individual charms are available for the cuffs. Charms in ready-made necklaces are not available. If you would like a custom cuff made, please contact me. The leather cuff is 3/4” wide and has two snaps on the back making it adjustable to 7 1/2" and 8 1/2" long fitting most women and men. A product card explaining the symbolism of the charm you choose will be included which makes this a great gift for anyone in your life. The fine silver charms are attached to the black leather and the bronze charms are attached to the brown leather. NOTE: You must leave me a note in the NOTE TO THE SELLER in PAYPAL telling me what charm you would like me to use on your leather cuff. (Click on image to enlarge.)

name: Achieve Your Desires – Running Fox Fine Silver Wax Seal Charm Men’s Bracelet

While the Irish have a proverb “The fox never found a better messenger than himself”, the Celts see the fox as a guide. With its entire body pointed like an arrow, the running fox is symbolic reminder to set a determined mindset in order to achieve your desires. The charm is just over 3/4” oval and attached to an adjustable black handcrafted macramé bracelet. Handcrafted in my studio just outside of Houston, Texas, each symbolic wax seal item from The Silver Acorn is hand-stamped in reclaimed fine silver or bronze and will be slightly different and uniquely yours. name: Everlasting Love Bronze Wax Seal Charm Bracelet
description: Handcrafted from an antique intaglio from the 1700-1800's, this bronze wax seal charm bracelet features Cupid and Psyche – symbols of everlasting love. Venus, the goddess of love and beauty, was very jealous of Psyche, the most beautiful woman in Sicily, and asked her son Cupid to make Psyche fall in love with a horrible monster. When Cupid saw how beautiful Psyche was, he dropped the arrow meant for her and pricked himself and fell in love with her. Cupid visited her every night to sleep with her, but demanded that she never cast her eyes upon him. Curious, Psyche held a lamp over Cupid as he slept, but a drop of oil fell from her lamp onto Cupid's shoulder and woke him. She watched him fly away, and she was heartbroken. After passing various tasks given to her by Venus, Cupid and Psyche were reunited. Jupiter made Psyche a goddess allowing Cupid and Psyche to get married and they lived happily ever after. The charm is just 1” x 1 ¼” rectangle and attached to three strands of brass cable chain with a lobster clasp closure. The bracelet measures 8" in length. Handcrafted in my studio just outside of Houston, Texas, each symbolic wax seal item from The Silver Acorn is hand-stamped in reclaimed fine silver or bronze and will be slightly different and uniquely yours. (Click on image to enlarge.)

name: Hope of a New Day Bronze Wax Seal Charm Bracelet
description: Handcrafted from an antique intaglio from the 1700-1800's, this bronze wax seal charm bracelet features Thorvaldsen's "Morning" scene of Eos, the Goddess of the Dawn symbolizing hope of a new day. Eos, the Titan Goddess of the Dawn, is depicted in art with rosy fingers, wearing a saffron robe and a tiara or diadem and is usually shown winged or riding a winged golden chariot. Each morning she used her rosy fingers to open the gates of heaven allowing her brother Helios, the sun God, to ride his chariot across the sky. She brought forth the hope of a new day. The charm is just over 1” round and attached to three strands of brass cable chain with a lobster clasp closure. The bracelet measures 8" in length. Handcrafted in my studio just outside of Houston, Texas, each symbolic wax seal item from The Silver Acorn is hand-stamped in reclaimed fine silver or bronze and will be slightly different and uniquely yours. (Click on image to enlarge.)

name: Peace and Protection - Olive Branch with Hebrew Text Wax Seal Ring
description: Handcrafted from an antique wax seal from late 1800 England, this wax seal features an olive branch which is the symbol of peace with the Hebrew text around it that translates to “He will wrap you and protect you”. In the Hebrew Bible, there are many times when God protected His people. We read in Joshua 24:17, “It was the LORD our God himself who brought us and our parents up out of Egypt, from that land of slavery, and performed those great signs before our eyes. He protected us on our entire journey and among all the nations through which we traveled.” Even though these words were written centuries ago, in a land so far removed from modern day life, they hold the same conviction as they did all those years ago. The Lord will always wrap his arms around you and keep you safe from your adversaries. He will remove the fear from your heart and guide you towards a peacefulness that calms your spirit and gives you renewed hope and strength. The charm is 5/8” x 1/2" oval and is set on a 3mm plain mat finished sterling silver band. Whole sizes from 5-10 only available. name: Polishing Cloth

This is an amazing product. I use these cloths in my studio and one cloth, used every day, lasts around two months. (Click on image to enlarge.)
